data.text:
✨ Mariah Carey's Magical Christmas ✨ is out now on @appletv 📺 I'm so excited to share this truly magical musical special with you and hope it brings you joy, laughter, and some much needed holiday cheer! 🎄❤️🎄❤️ Watch now: https://t.co/vFcd461qR7
#MariahsMagicalChristmas https://t.co/1CY2sKYa7g

🎅🏽's gonna come and make him mine this Christmas 🎤
🎅🏽's gonna come and make him mine Ho Ho Ho 🎤
🎅🏽's gonna come and make him mine this Christmas night 🎤

#OhSanta with my amazingly talented and beautiful friends @IAMJHUD and @arianagrande out now! https://t.co/0WUTB8cxBD https://t.co/UNjLId34eC

https://t.co/k8mBxpsvIN https://t.co/Ep01ulJrLG

Tonight. Midnight. 
A magical moment✨

how it started / how it's going 🌨 #ohsanta friday @mariahcarey @iamjhud https://t.co/P5DpfUIvNi

Oh Santa is coming to you tonight, and yes it is the perfect thing to get you into the holiday spirit!

Thank you @MariahCarey for having me! Music Video premier is linked in my bio. https://t.co/iXilEQzfWJ

We’ve been saying #ThankYouGA for everyone who worked to ensure people’s voices were heard in the election. Now it’s time for us to ACT!

Support the Georgia orgs who have powered the movement for greater voting rights. Visit https://t.co/wqSqeEMxL4 to #WinWithBlackWomen
Thank you @robinhoodnyc for making a difference and celebrating our real life heroes. Happy to be a part of tonight's show! ❤️ #NY4NY @iheartradio https://t.co/BW7nXPImYl https://t.co/IJN7OtnSh9
Tune in for a special HEROES performance 💖 https://t.co/p2VSp3O0oD
No Scrooges allowed! It's time to get festive!!! 🎉🎄💖 https://t.co/KEuZJomRVE

Watch me play @ELLEmagazine's Song Association game! I tried cheating by writing some new ones, I should've gotten the points!! 😄💖

https://t.co/kAXpJvOUSa https://t.co/KrSLvHt6FD

All @MariahCarey wants for Christmas? To spread the holiday cheer. On December 4, she will star in ‘Mariah Carey’s Magical Christmas Special’ for @AppleTV. “I hope people feel festive when they watch this special, and I hope it helps in some way." https://t.co/LnvgOcHyWb https://t.co/1ELpuSyxfd
Essential 2020 reading! 💖📖 https://t.co/dj97AyvKIA

If this doesn't melt your heart, you're a Grinch! 😆❤️❤️❤️ https://t.co/k6H49akLNy

Happy Thanksgiving, everyone!! Stay safe and healthy ❤️ and ask yourself... what would you rather be:   Turkey or Ham?? 😂 #tbt https://t.co/9zVq9TlAaj https://t.co/n9eOGniGNM

For millions of hungry Americans, Thanksgiving tables are bare. But we can change that! A donation to @ampleharvest connects more gardeners with food pantries. Let’s make sure mashed potatoes and green bean casseroles are still on the table: https://t.co/b7JtDsFsii
